content: is he a crewmate or is he the imposter we may never know but we do know that he is a cutie measuring almost 12 inches tall he is the perfect size for snuggling or resting your head on while you play the insanely popular mobile game this pattern includes 3 different options for your crewmate s backpack including the button-close flap shown in the photos so you can choose the style that fits you best **copyright notice** all pattern text and photos are © amanda perkins glamazon crochet designs and may not be copied for any purpose including but not limited to redistribution online or in print if you wish to share this or any other pattern please provide the recipient with a link to the pattern instead if you wish to use one or more of my patterns in a round-up on your own blog you may use one 1 photo per pattern the among us game and its characters crewmate imposter pets are not my intellectual property thus i cannot give permission to sell finished products created from this pattern if you post a photo of your finished product on social media a link to www facebook com/glamazoncrochet or to this pattern page is greatly appreciated your adherence to these guidelines is appreciated and ensures that i can continue providing quality patterns free of charge
